SEARCH
Package com.example.flashcardsystent.viewmodel

Class ClassicViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
com.example.flashcardsystent.viewmodel.ClassicViewModel
public class ClassicViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
ViewModel managing state and logic for the classic learning mode. Handles showing cards in sequence and tracking performance (correct/incorrect).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    ClassicViewModel(android.app.Application application)
    Constructs a new ClassicViewModel with access to repositories and DAOs.

    • ClassicViewModel

      public ClassicViewModel(@NonNull android.app.Application application)
      Constructs a new ClassicViewModel with access to repositories and DAOs.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • loadCards

      public void loadCards(int deckId, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner lifecycleOwner)
      Loads all cards from a given deck and prepares the session queue.
      Parameters:
      deckId - ID of the selected deck
      lifecycleOwner - the lifecycle context to observe data

    • onKnow

      public void onKnow()
      Marks the current card as known and proceeds to the next one. If all cards are completed, sets the session as finished.

    • onDontKnow

      public void onDontKnow()
      Marks the current card as unknown, reinserts it into the queue, and proceeds to the next one. Updates statistics.

    • getFinished

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Boolean> getFinished()
      Returns:
      LiveData that becomes true when all cards have been shown

    • saveResult

      public void saveResult(int deckId)
      Saves the result of the session to the database asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      deckId - ID of the deck the session was based on

    • getCurrentCard

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Card> getCurrentCard()
      Returns:
      LiveData representing the currently visible card

    • getTotalCount

      public int getTotalCount()
      Returns:
      the total number of cards loaded for this session

    • getKnowClicks

      public int getKnowClicks()
      Returns:
      the number of times the user clicked "I know"

    • getDontKnowClicks

      public int getDontKnowClicks()
      Returns:
      the number of times the user clicked "I don't know"

    • getDontKnowCount

      public int getDontKnowCount(int cardId)
      Returns how many times a specific card was marked as unknown.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the ID of the card
      Returns:
      number of "don't know" interactions for the card

    • getMostDifficultCard

      @Nullable public Card getMostDifficultCard()
      Returns:
      the card most often marked as unknown, or null if none
